products.title: Splash Teal Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Teal Blue 89mm Vertical Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.60 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Our vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1475 Fabric Colour: Teal Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Turquoise Blue 89mm Vertical Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Turquoise Blue vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish.  A moisture-resistant saturated blue fabric with a beautiful green undertone, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At Swift Direct Blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.  This bespoke blue vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Tiffany Blue is a chic light blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1326 Fabric Colour: Tiffany Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Clear Tilt Wand or Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Como
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Como Budget Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Budget Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
